goals__remit:
He wants to be an integrated research, committed to growth in the analysis, processing, collaboration, creation and marketing of data, guides and specific patterns. 
Encourage collaboration between firms and territories to enhance competitiveness and support the emergence of a new business-class. 
 
The Agency will undertake to work primarily with and for companies of all sizes, from micro to corporations, made in Italy with operational and / or intellectual property rights both domestic and foreign, to make significant research services as primarily commercial circuits of different segments and specific patterns. 
These generated data can be collected and / or distributed in paper media type and / or information to companies, institutions as long as legally recognized for this purpose
